snippet: Browns quarterback Johnny Manziel, back as a starter after being punished, said, “I’m definitely not taking that lightly.”
abstract: NFL Roundup; Cleveland Browns quarterback Johnny Manziel, who was demoted for poor off-field behavior, is excited to be back in starting lineup for upcoming game against Pittsburgh Steelers; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Browns quarterback Johnny Manziel, back as a starter after being punished, said, “I’m definitely not taking that lightly.”

headline.print_headline: Manziel Calls His Benching ‘a Hard Lesson’
headline.main: Johnny Manziel Calls His Benching ‘a Hard Lesson’
